ygData.subject: Re: Demon Claw (Bladed Thulian)
ygData.msgSnippet: The damage is OK (for that level of item (.263 d/del)) but I think the big attraction of the demon claw is it s weight.  I think is under 1 and if you are
ygData.messageBody:
The damage is OK (for that level of item (.263 d/del)) but I think the
big attraction of the demon claw is it's weight. I think is under 1
and if you are trying to squeeze on Bronze plate and still carry loot
it comes in real handy. If you are the second coming of Arnold then
there are probabily better weapons out there for 500pp.

Bujold


______________________________ Reply Separator _________________________________
Subject: [eqbards] Demon Claw (Bladed Thulian)
Author: Non-HP-lankyak (lankyak@...) at HP-ColSprings,mimegw5
Date: 7/9/99 11:32 AM


From: lankyak@...

Anyways, is a demon claw worth 500 pp? It's a dam 5 delay 19 weapon and comes of
f the Avatar of Fear in Cazic.
I don't want to shell out my entire bank just because it's the loot of a high le
vel creature.

Level 30 bard
Povar
